ygData.subject: Hey  Brion Hook ! Twinking with XP
ygData.msgSnippet: I hope this is a exploit. Not sure of a verant employees email address, so here it is for you. Maybe you know who to send it to. ... enchanters ... of ... full
ygData.messageBody:
I hope this is a exploit. Not sure of a verant employees email address, so
here it is for you. Maybe you know who to send it to.




> A few other classes have spells that allow this also (clerics and
enchanters
> come to mind). The only caveat is you might consider fighting a few
> normally to keep your combat skills progressing also. I have seen a lot
of
> stories about characters advancing so far (through quests and this type of
> maneuver) that they are no longer able to perform effectively at their new
> level. Some combat skills can be purchased, but I don't think Offense or
> Defense can be. Otherwise, yes, that is a good technique for people who
> need to level in a hurry (to catch up with old friends for example).
>
> Rayne, Karana
>



>
> > From: McJimbly17@...
> >
> > ok, i know its easy to twink some little newbiefied character with a
full
> set
> > of crafted or highlevel stuff but there is also a way for certain
classes
> to
> > twink people with xp! I know for a fact monks can do this and i think
> necros
> > and shadownights might be able to also. the trick is that is a monk
> feighns
> > death succesfully it erases all the dmg done to a mob by them, so that
if
> you
> > step up and blast it and you get all the xp! this works easyest on
undead
> for
> > clerics. just buy ward undead, go to grimrots spawning area and have
your
> > highlevel monk friend pull some skellys and beat them down the the last
> legs
> > of there life. he falls down, the skellys stand there you ward and poof
a
> bar
> > and a half of xp!!!!! i got from level 6 to level 14 in under 6 hours
> doing
> > this!!!!
> > i haven't tested this with necro's and shadownights feign death spell
but
> i
> > belive this will work. wizards could be powerleveled like this too. i
> know
> > since i am posting it verant will probly change this calling it an
exploit
> > but hey, i already did it so i don't care if it gets changed =)
> > don't know if thats a spolier but its certainly helpful!!!
> > Binx
> >
>
